title: How to Play Rock Band Drums on Your PC

steps.headline: Plug your Rock Band drums into a USB port of your computer.
steps.description: Now let it install the software etc.

steps.headline: Now you want the game!
steps.description: The one this guide is based on is called Frets on Fire, there is a link in the tips to the version you will need.

steps.headline: You will also need to download Winrar to extract themes and songs into song folders.
After you have installed Frets on Fire you want the Rock Band 2 Theme.
steps.description: You will need to extract the main folder into the folder Data, then Themes. Then in game go to options then change the theme to the K.I.D rock band 2 theme.

steps.headline: You will need a song with a drum chart, there will be a link in tips to a massive list but watch out some of them are extremely hard, just Google around for Frets on Fire drums songs for more.
Now after downloading the song, open it up with winrar and extract it to a folder that you made your song directory when you started frets on fire for the first time.
steps.description: After it has been extracted go to Frets on Fire and go to options controls then choose the drums one and press enter on each drum and hit them in this order, red,yellow,blue,green,foot pedal. Then you can do abxy and the left right up down and start and back buttons. Then use the drums to navigate the menu to verify that it works. Done! Go download Wolfe's Drum Career on the frets on fire fan forums, just make an account.

text: Plug your Rock Band drums into a USB port of your computer. Now let it install the software etc. Now you want the game! The one this guide is based on is called Frets on Fire, there is a link in the tips to the version you will need. You will also need to download Winrar to extract themes and songs into song folders.  After you have installed Frets on Fire you want the Rock Band 2 Theme. You will need to extract the main folder into the folder Data, then Themes. Then in game go to options then change the theme to the K.I.D rock band 2 theme. You will need a song with a drum chart, there will be a link in tips to a massive list but watch out some of them are extremely hard, just Google around for Frets on Fire drums songs for more.  Now after downloading the song, open it up with winrar and extract it to a folder that you made your song directory when you started frets on fire for the first time. After it has been extracted go to Frets on Fire and go to options controls then choose the drums one and press enter on each drum and hit them in this order, red,yellow,blue,green,foot pedal. Then you can do abxy and the left right up down and start and back buttons. Then use the drums to navigate the menu to verify that it works. Done! Go download Wolfe's Drum Career on the frets on fire fan forums, just make an account.
